options.content:
NTM - Nexus Traffic Monitoring - Switches

Switch(es) - ${switchname}

targets.query: SELECT last("model"),location FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("switchname") from (select model,switchname FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter
SELECT last("switch") from (select model,switch FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter
SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("sys_ver") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter
select count(last) from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf) where $timeFilter
SELECT last("kernel_uptime") AS "Uptime" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("cpu_user") AS "CPU User", mean("cpu_kernel") AS "CPU Kernel" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("cpu_kernel") as "Kernel - % CPU" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter group by time($__interval)
SELECT mean("cpu_user") as "User - % CPU" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter group by time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "400G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "oper_speed" = 400) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "100G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "oper_speed" = 100) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "25G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "oper_speed" = 25) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "10G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "1G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "oper_speed" = 1) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "access" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ and oper_mode = 'access') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "trunk" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ and oper_mode = 'trunk') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Switch" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ and peer_type='switch') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Host" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE type='nexus' and ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ and peer_type='host') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT (mean(mem_used)/mean(mem_total)) as "Mem Used %" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("mem_used")/last("mem_total")*100 FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter

select count(last) AS "Up" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ and oper_state = 'up' and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Down" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ and oper_state = 'down' and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "None" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ and oper_state = 'None') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Unknown" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ and oper_state = '') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Admin Down" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "down_reason" = 'admin-down') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "XCVR Absent" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "down_reason" = 'xcvr-absent') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Link Failure" from (SELECT last("rx_bytes") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "down_reason" = 'link-failure') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean(response_time) as "Response Time" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter group by time($__interval)

value.title: Details of Peer Switch ${__data.fields["Peer Device"]}
value.url: d/ntm-nexus-${__data.fields["Peer Type"]}-monitoring-${__data.fields["Peer Type"]}?var-${__data.fields["Peer Type"]}name=${__data.fields["Peer Device Name"]}&${__url_time_range}

value.title: Details of Interface ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} in ${__data.fields["Peer Device"]}
Details of ${__data.fields.Role} ${__data.fields["Peer Device"]}
value.url: d/ntm-nexus-${__data.fields["Peer Type"]}-monitoring-${__data.fields["Peer Type"]}?var-${__data.fields["Peer Type"]}name=${__data.fields["Peer Device Name"]}&${__url_time_range}

targets.query: SELECT last(description) as "Description", oper_state as "Operational State", peer as "Peer Device", peer_type as "Peer Type", peer_name as "Peer Device Name", peer_intf as "Peer Interface", oper_mode as "Oper Mode", down_reason as "Down Reason", oper_speed as "Speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY intf

select sum("RX Traffic") as "RX" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_bytes)*8/elapsed(oper_speed,1s)as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switch) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum("TX Traffic") as "TX" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_bytes)*8/elapsed(oper_speed,1s)as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switch) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total CRC" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(max(rx_crc))/elapsed(max(oper_speed),1s)  FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total CRC Stomped" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(max(rx_crc_stomped))/elapsed(max(oper_speed),1s)  FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum("last_first") as "Total Random Dropped Packets" from (SELECT last(rand_drop_pkts) - first(rand_drop_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,q) where $timeFilter

select sum("last_first") as "Total Dropped Packets" from (SELECT last(drop_pkts) - first(drop_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,q) where $timeFilter

select max("RX Traffic")/(max("speed")*1000000000) as "% RX Utilization", max("speed") as "Speed" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_bytes)*8/elapsed(oper_speed,1s)as "RX Traffic", last(oper_speed) as "speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switchname) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf, switchname

select max("TX Traffic")/(max("speed")*1000000000) as "% TX Utilization", max("speed") as "Speed" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_bytes)*8/elapsed(oper_speed,1s)as "TX Traffic", last(oper_speed) as "speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,switchname) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf, switchname

select top("max",intf,10) as "CRC" from (select max("CRC") from(SELECT last(rx_crc) - first(rx_crc) as "CRC" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf) where $timeFilter

select top("max",intf,10) as "Stomped CRC" from (select max("CRC") from(SELECT last(rx_crc_stomped) - first(rx_crc_stomped) as "CRC" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf) where $timeFilter

select top("max",intf,10) as "Drops" from (select max("last_first") from(SELECT last(rand_drop_pkts) - first(rand_drop_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,q) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,q) where $timeFilter

select top("max",intf,q,10) as "Drops" from (select max("last_first") from (SELECT last(drop_pkts) - first(drop_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,q) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,q) where $timeFilter

value.title: Details of ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} on peer switch ${__data.fields["Peer Name"]}

targets.query: select max("last_first") as "RX Pause" from(SELECT last(rx_pause) - first(rx_pause) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter and peer_type='switch' group by intf,q,peer_name,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,q,peer_name,peer,peer_intf

value.title: Details of ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} on peer host ${__data.fields["Peer Name"]}

targets.query: select max("last_first") as "RX Pause" from(SELECT last(rx_pause) - first(rx_pause) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter and peer_type='host' group by intf,q,peer_name,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,q,peer_name,peer,peer_intf

value.title: Details of ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} on peer switch ${__data.fields["Peer Name"]}

targets.query: select max("last_first") as "TX Pause" from(SELECT last(tx_pause) - first(tx_pause) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter and peer_type='switch' group by intf,q,peer_name,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,q,peer_name,peer,peer_intf

value.title: Details of ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} on peer host ${__data.fields["Peer Name"]}

targets.query: select max("last_first") as "TX Pause" from(SELECT last(tx_pause) - first(tx_pause) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter and peer_type='host' group by intf,q,peer_name,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,q,peer_name,peer,peer_intf

value.title: Details of ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} on peer switch ${__data.fields["Peer Name"]}

targets.query:
select max("last_first") as "ECN Marked Packets" from(SELECT last(ecn_marked_pkts) - first(ecn_marked_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter and peer_type='switch' 
 group by intf,q,peer_name,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY intf,q,peer_name,peer,peer_intf

panels.title: Top 10 Core Interfaces - ECN Marked Packets (Egress Congestion)

value.title: Details of ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} on peer host ${__data.fields["Peer Name"]}

targets.query: select max("last_first") as "ECN Marked Packets" from(SELECT last(ecn_marked_pkts) - first(ecn_marked_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,q,peer_name,peer_type,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter and peer_type='host' GROUP BY intf,q,peer_name,peer,peer_intf

panels.title: Top 10 Edge Interfaces - ECN Marked Packets (Egress Congestion)

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "RX Pause" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_pause) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='switch' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer_name, peer_intf

panels.title: RX Pause (Egress Congestion) on Core Interfaces on $switchname

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "RX Pause" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_pause) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer_name, peer_intf

panels.title: RX Pause (Egress Congestion) on Edge Interfaces on $switchname

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "TX Pause" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_pause) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='switch' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer_name, peer_intf

panels.title: TX Pause (Ingress Congestion) on Core Interfaces $switchname

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "TX Pause" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_pause) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer_name, peer_intf

panels.title: TX Pause (Ingress Congestion) on Edge Interfaces on $switchname

targets.query: select sum("non_negative_difference") as "Shutdown" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(shutdown) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPFCWD" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,qosgrp) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, qosgrp

select sum("non_negative_difference") as "Restored" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(restored) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPFCWD" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,qosgrp) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, qosgrp

select sum("non_negative_difference") as "Drained" from(SELECT non_negative_difference("pkt-drained") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPFCWD" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,qosgrp) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, qosgrp

select sum("non_negative_difference") as "Dropped" from(SELECT non_negative_difference("pkt-dropped") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPFCWD" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,qosgrp) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, qosgrp

panels.title: PFC Watchdog Stats (Severe Egress Congestion) on $switchname

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "Drops" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(drop_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='switch' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer_name, peer_intf

panels.title: Packet Drops on Core Interfaces on $switchname

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "Drops" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(drop_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer_name, peer_intf

panels.title: Packet Drops on Edge Interfaces on $switchname

targets.query: select max("RX Traffic") as "RX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_bytes)*8/elapsed(oper_speed,1s) as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='switch' AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf, peer_name,peer_intf

panels.title: RX Traffic on Core Interfaces on $switchname

targets.query: select max("RX Traffic") as "RX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_bytes)*8/elapsed(oper_speed,1s) as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='host' AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf, peer_name,peer_intf

panels.title: RX Traffic on Edge Interfaces on $switchname

targets.query: select max("TX Traffic") as "TX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_bytes)*8/elapsed(oper_speed,1s) as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='switch' AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf,peer_name,peer_intf

select max("TX Traffic") as "TX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_bytes)*8/elapsed(oper_speed,1s) as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='host' AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf,peer_name,peer_intf

panels.title: TX Traffic on Edge Interfaces on $switchname

targets.query: select max("RX Traffic")/(max("speed")*1000000000) as "RX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_bytes)*8/elapsed(oper_speed,1s)as "RX Traffic", last(oper_speed) as "speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='switch' AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf,peer_name,peer_intf

select max("RX Traffic")/(max("speed")*1000000000) as "RX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_bytes)*8/elapsed(oper_speed,1s)as "RX Traffic", last(oper_speed) as "speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='host' AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf,peer_name,peer_intf

select max("TX Traffic")/(max("speed")*1000000000) as "TX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_bytes)*8/elapsed(oper_speed,1s)as "TX Traffic", last(oper_speed) as "speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='switch' AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf,peer_name,peer_intf

select max("TX Traffic")/(max("speed")*1000000000) as "TX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_bytes)*8/elapsed(oper_speed,1s)as "TX Traffic", last(oper_speed) as "speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='host' AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf,peer_name,peer_intf

panels.title: TX % Utilization on Edge Interfaces on $switchname

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "ECN Marked Pkts" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(ecn_marked_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='switch' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer, peer_intf

panels.title: ECN Counters (Egress Congestion) on Core Interfaces on $switchname

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "ECN Marked Pkts" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(ecn_marked_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and peer_type='host' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer, peer_intf

panels.title: ECN Counters (Egress Congestion) on Edge Interfaces on $switchname

targets.query: SELECT peak as "Peak" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBurst" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf, q
SELECT peak as "Peak" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBurst" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY switchname,intf, q
SELECT "duration" as "Duration" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBurst" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf, q
SELECT "duration" as "Duration" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBurst" where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchname,intf, q
SELECT peak as "Peak" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBurst" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf, q
SELECT "duration" as "Duration" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBurst" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf, q

panels.title: Burst (Left y-axis show peak buffer utilization in bytes using bars. Right y-axis show duration of burst in microseconds using point)

targets.query: SELECT (non_negative_difference(mean(rx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8 as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/) and "peer_name" =~ /$peer_switch_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),intf, peer_name

panels.title: Traffic Distribution on $switchname on links to $peer_switch_name

targets.query: SELECT peak_cell_no_drop as "Peak usage no-drop" FROM  "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBufferStats" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY instance,sw
SELECT max(cell_count_no_drop_pg) as "Max allowed cells no-drop" FROM  "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBufferStats" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND $timeFilter group by time($__interval)
SELECT peak_cell_drop_pg as "Peak usage drop" FROM  "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBufferStats" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY instance
SELECT max(cell_count_drop_pg) as "Max allowed cells drop" FROM  "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBufferStats" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND $timeFilter group by time($__interval)

list.definition: show tag values from  "$db"."$rp"."Switches" with key=switchname WHERE type='nexus' and $timeFilter
list.label: Switch Name
list.name: switchname
list.query: show tag values from  "$db"."$rp"."Switches" with key=switchname WHERE type='nexus' and $timeFilter

list.definition: select last(elapsed) from (select elapsed(model,1s) from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where switchname =~ /$switchname/ and type='nexus' and $timeFilter)
list.name: min_interval
list.query: select last(elapsed) from (select elapsed(model,1s) from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where switchname =~ /$switchname/ and type='nexus' and $timeFilter)

list.definition: show tag values from  "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" with key=peer_name  WHERE type='nexus' and switchname =~ /$switchname/ and peer_type='switch' and $timeFilter
list.label: Peer Switch Name
list.name: peer_switch_name
list.query: show tag values from  "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" with key=peer_name  WHERE type='nexus' and switchname =~ /$switchname/ and peer_type='switch' and $timeFilter

list.definition: select last(switch) from (select model,switch from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where switchname =~ /$switchname/ and type='nexus1' and $timeFilter)
list.name: switch
list.query: select last(switch) from (select model,switch from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where switchname =~ /$switchname/ and type='nexus1' and $timeFilter)

list.definition: select last(switch) from (select model,switch from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where switchname =~ /$peer_switch_name/ and type='nexus' and $timeFilter group by peer_switch_name) group by peer_switch_name
list.name: peer_switches
list.query: select last(switch) from (select model,switch from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where switchname =~ /$peer_switch_name/ and type='nexus' and $timeFilter group by peer_switch_name) group by peer_switch_name
